description: The Code component allows you to display the source code.

note1.text: Before using this component, make sure you have imported the fonts into the project. You can learn more about importing fonts into a project

note2.text: Before using this component, make sure you have installed the icon library in your project. You can learn more about installing icons in a project

default.title: Default
default.description: By default, you don't need to pass any props other than code to this component. It is beautiful and convenient out of the box. Code will automatically adjust to the transmitted data.

inline.title: Inline
inline.description: The Code component can be used as an insert into the text, for this you need to pass the props inline component

change icons.title: Change Icons
change icons.description: You can change the default icons in a component. To do this, you need to specify the beforeIcon or afterIcon parameter and pass the necessary icon inside.
